base_description: Gray, rectangular cabinet with three drawers.
part_description: Three equally sized drawers stacked vertically, each with a horizontal handle near the top.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the cabinet frame, supported by metal runners. The handles are securely attached to the front of each drawer, allowing for easy pulling.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a desk, interacting with users who open drawers to store or retrieve items. The flat top surface can hold small objects or decorations.
